BotShield
Defenses | Robots.txt | Paywall | References

How To Implement A Web Crawler Paywall

GATEKEEP

Introduce a small payment gate (via Stripe or API) for bots wanting content

1

AUTHORIZE

Upon successful payment the site will issue a time-limited JWT

2

VERIFY

Bot identity is logged and abuse can be blocked

3

MONETIZE

Sites can charge differently for training vs one-time use

4
